duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and complete individual tax returns in compliance with IRS regulations and standards.
Work efficiently in a fast-paced environment to meet client needs and deadlines.
Effectively communicate with clients in person and in writing to address tax-related inquiries and provide guidance.
Meet all IRS and applicable state requirements, and participate in required continuing education to ensure compliance.
Conduct tax planning and provide support during tax audits for clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (CPA or Enrolled Agent certification preferred)
5+ years of experience in accounting, finance, bookkeeping, or tax (Sales and/or marketing experience preferred)
Bilingual candidates strongly encouraged to apply
